title: Ash Echoes Tier List
description: Comprehensive tier list for Ash Echoes, detailing character rankings from S to C Tier with descriptions to aid in team building and strategy.
heading: Ash Echoes Tier List
introText: Comprehensive tier list for Ash Echoes, detailing character rankings from S to C Tier with descriptions to aid in team building and strategy.

data.itemDescription: A formidable physical damage dealer excelling in sustained DPS and versatility across various team compositions
An exceptional fire-element DPS known for high damage output in both Cannis and Human forms; lacks Anti-Air abilities
A versatile 5-star support offering healing, buffs, and cooldown reduction, making her invaluable in any team setup
The premier healer providing shields and enhanced healing to shielded allies; essential for team survivability
A corrosion-based Echomancer delivering consistent damage over time and synergizing well with various team compositions
A top-tier specialist adept at controlling the battlefield with crowd control abilities and significant burst damage
A powerful DPS character excelling in close combat with high burst damage and agility
A wind-element skirmisher effective against multiple enemies, particularly in regular stages or story modes with numerous mobs
A fire-element specialist with impressive DPS and Anti-Air capabilities; excels against enemies with barriers
A 5-star support providing attack speed buffs and decent AoE damage; remains effective through mid-to-late game
A versatile Echomancer offering a balance of offense and defense, suitable for various team roles
An ice-element Echomancer with strong crowd control abilities, making her valuable in controlling enemy movements
A popular 5-star Echomancer capable of tackling various game stages and modes; offers tested combat abilities
A specialist known for unique abilities that can turn the tide of battle when used strategically
A reliable Echomancer providing consistent support and utility across different scenarios
The second-best healer offering substantial healing, resistances, and decent damage; can also serve as a team leader
A corrosion team leader relying on attack speed to deal damage; easy to play and effective with various teammates
A wind-element striker considered superior to Scarlett in certain scenarios; benefits from strong trace memories and upcoming support characters
An Echomancer offering balanced abilities suitable for early to mid-game content
A character providing reliable support and damage, fitting well into various team compositions
A 5-star Echomancer with crowd control abilities; optimal choice for activating specific memory traces and maintaining effectiveness over time
A free tank available upon completing the introductory tutorial; provides essential defense for the team
An Echomancer with balanced offensive and defensive capabilities, suitable for various team roles
A reliable front-line tank offering healing and survivability; valuable in early game stages
A corrosion Echomancer suitable for early game; effectiveness diminishes in later stages
An Echomancer with niche abilities; requires specific team setups to be effective
A fire-element Echomancer with decent early-game damage; less effective in late-game content
Provides revival, shields, and HP buffs; useful in early game but less impactful later
An Echomancer with balanced abilities; effectiveness depends on team composition
A corrosion Echomancer; effectiveness depends on team composition and investment
An Echomancer with situational utility; requires specific scenarios to shine
A character offering support abilities; effectiveness varies based on team needs
